job description:
U.S. Citizens and those authorized to work in the U.S. are encouraged to apply. We are unable to sponsor at this time.

Applicants only, no corp-to-corp candidates, third parties, or agencies please.

Required Skills and Experience:
  • Very strong, engaging, outgoing interpersonal skills
  • Experience in interacting and working directly with business customers
  • Experience translating data analysis to business customers
  • Ability to sell products and suggest solutions to customers based on the data
  • High energy, people person is required for this position
  • Outstanding, articulate, and clear communication skills
  • Ability to convey ideas and generate solutions to business customers
  • Ability to answer clinical data-related questions from business customers
  • Ability to manage customer expectations
  • Strong personality
  • Very strong attention to detail
  • Outstanding organizational and prioritization skills to understand project status, answer questions, handle multiple (and sometimes conflicting) priorities and requests.
  • Ability to analyze business needs to determine technical requirements and communicate with engineers and business stakeholders.
  • Understand data warehouse concepts, schemas, relational and dimensional data models.
  • Strong SQL query skills for relational databases (Postgres and Redshift)
  • Healthcare data experience
  • Understanding of healthcare data products
  • Customer service background
  • Data feasibility background
  • Agile/Scrum experience
  • Experience in Acceptance Test Driven Development (ATDD)-related requirements methods
  • Data modeling
Job Description:

We are seeking a business-focused data analyst who will work directly with our client’s customers and the sales team as a support and sponsor of our client’s products. It is a rapid and very fast-paced work environment because the selected candidate must respond very quickly to the client’s customers’ clinical data needs.

Our client has a very innovative, collaborative, friendly, and exciting work environment and culture.

Responsibilities include:
  • Execute daily operations queries to ensure that all files were received from vendors.
  • Ensure that all data was ingested, exports occurred, and data quality counts match expectations.
  • Serve as a triage point for issue resolution with vendors and customers.
  • Contact vendors to arrange for data to be re-sent and communicate with downstream customers as to the status of issues resolution.
  • Escalate to management, stakeholders, engineering, and infrastructure staff as necessary.
  • Ensure data quality by analyzing counts of data sent, processed, and received.
  • Identify and investigate data anomalies in the data warehouse and create defect cards for corrections of code and/or data.
  • Decompose epics into user stories that include technical requirements for development
  • Lead team joint application development discussions, and issue sizing and prioritization
  • For small projects, work directly with stakeholders and other technical teams to plan sequencing and timeline for development and testing activities.
